text: Farvagny was a municipality of the district Saane in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == History == In 1996, the former municipalities of Farvagny-le- Grand, Farvagny-le-Petit, Grenilles and Posat merged to form it.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Corpataux-Magnedens, Farvagny, Le Gl√®be, Rossens and Vuisternens-en-Ogoz merged to form the new municipality of Gibloux.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 January 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Farvagny
